/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, each with its own unique architectural style and color scheme. On the right side of the street, there's a large construction site, indicating ongoing development in the area. Cars and motorcycles are parked along the street, adding to the urban atmosphere. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene.
